page.title: 18A Night Out in Strathmiglo
page.content: Situated on the High Street are from east to west,the Royal Hotel,The Strathmiglo Inn and The Tavern. Though there is practically no through traffic on the High Street nowadays, it was originally the old Dunfermline /Perth Road. The Strathmiglo Inn, which dates back to 1710,became a Coaching inn, much frequented by travellers as well as local people. It may also have been used by residents of and visitors to Falkland Palace. Nowadays,it is also much frequented by travellers, especially business men, because it is within easy travelling distance of such places as St. Andrews,Perth,Dundee and Edinburgh, and has a reputation for a high standard of cuisine. The present owners plan to restore the Inn, with changes to both the inside and outside.
